metadata.title: CVE-2023-0804 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in tiffcrop in tools/tiffcrop.c:3609, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 33aee127.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0804` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.3
libtiff-tools - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.3
libtiff5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.3
libtiffxx5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-4ubuntu3.3').
